size.title: Icon Size
size.description: Set the default icon size. Set to false to disable the sizing of icon in style.

url.title: Iconify API URL
url.description: Define a custom Iconify API URL. Useful if you want to use a self-hosted Iconify API. Learn more: https://iconify.design/docs/api.

publicApiFallback.title: Public Iconify API fallback
publicApiFallback.description: Define if the public Iconify API should be used as fallback.
